problem_text: The diameters of \odot A, \odot B, and \odot C are 10, 30 and 10 units, respectively. Find Z X if A Z \cong C W and C W = 2.
compact_text: The diameters of \odot A, \odot B, and \odot C are 10, 30 and 10 units, respectively. Find ZX if AZ \cong CW and CW = 2.
annotat_text: The diameters of $\odot A, \odot B,$ and $\odot C$ are 10, 30 and 10 units, respectively. Find ZX if $\overline{A Z} \cong \overline{C W}$ and $C W=2$.
